name: The Fool
info:
The one who unacquainted with fear through ignorance

Sets forth on a voyage without a target in sight

For the heart of exploration should not be forsaken

Even blind strides may have their place

name: The World
info: The one who looks around at a loss|Stands still on the shores of a starry sea|The door to eternity lies ajar|Leap into infinite rebirth|For what is given, shall be returned in kind

name: Wheel of Fortune
info:
The one who traverses reincarnation


Is also a captive of destiny


The endless spiral, unpredictable


A choice to alter fate, exists but in a fleeting moment

name: The Star
info:
The one who rushes about at night

Shines upon the earth with the light of stars

Even though the time of sunrise is unknown

She brings hope for the newcomers and guides the road ahead

name: The Emperor
info:
The one who is crowned king |
Sits alone on the top of the world |
He expels the chaos with order |
And faces the abyss with bravery

name: The Moon
info:
The restless one |
Who seeks solace from the silent moon. |
For he takes the winding path, shrouded in mist and marked by uncertainty. |
Treading towards an unknown future.

name: The Magician
info:
The one who sparks inspiration |
Opens the first page of the infinite intelligence for the world |
By foreseeing the future |
He plays it by ear as a mystery

name: Judgement
info:
The lost and the ignorant |
Do not see the moment of Judgement approaching |
Their tombs will crumble at the trumpet's call |
Awakened, they will be cleansed and reborn

name: The Devil
info:
The one who sinks into the human nature |
Is obsessed with the warmth of the fire of hell |
He is still wrongheaded and whispering |
And can never break away from these self-inflicted shackles

name: Temperance
info:
The one who harmonizes everything |
Wanders at the boundary of virtuality and reality |
She goes with the flow and arrives at the source |
After refinement and purification

name: The Chariot
info:
The one who holds the rein proudly |
Heads for the battlefield with unbreakable will |
He balances the will and instinct |
And his chariot passes through time, turning ditches into roads

name: The Sun
info:
The one who praises piously |
Wishes the hope will cover the world like the dawn light |
The flame of life travels through hardships and never extinguishes |
And the song of ideals spreads throughout all things

name: The Hanged Man
info:
The one who hangs upside down in danger |
Calmly accepts the day of destruction in his heart |
He uses his body as a sword, piercing through the twisted world |
And walks through the dark night, pointing towards the light

name: The Tower
info:
The one who soars high into the clouds |
Is burnt by flames in an instant of wrath |
He falls from the ladder of vanity |
And his soul disperses like ashes, yet his sin remains

name: The Lovers
info:
Together in Hand |
Making Good Wishes in Blessings |
Severance, Reforging |
The Bonds Link to a New Chapter

name: The High Priestess
info:
Messenger of the New Moon |
Verses of Wisdom Encircle |
Gentle as Still Water, Treading the Boundary of Light and Shadow|
The Curtain Rises Lightly, perceiving the truths of this World
